Author: morantis
Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: TriForce Tokens Exchange Listings & Updates! The final token sale is ending soon, and we have some project updates! The day you all have been waiting for, is finally here! But first, we want to take a moment to thank you all for your patience this past year, as we prepared, executed plans and worked tirelessly on growing this project.  We have been diligent in working with partners and advisors to ensure we give the community and investors the best experience with our project. The TriForce Team wants to be as transparent as possible during the next steps in the project's growth, and so we want to share our plans of having $FORCE listed on exchanges.  The listing plans will take place in stages, we will lay out stage one, below. Over time, we have learned valuable lessons by reviewing many ICO’s during this volatile and bearish market, that’s why we have worked closely with partners and advisors to go about this not only the smart way but also the careful way! So with that being said, here is our stage one plan.  The First Stage: Listing on at least 2–3 top-75 exchanges  https://medium.com/@triforcetokens/triforce-tokens-exchange-listings-announcements-34d710cb55f9

Author: ancientcoins
Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: Hi guys! When your project announces ico dates, there is no specific information in the first post, but I dare say that the company has stretched out a lot, it's already half a year since it started the beginning. Are you so carefully prepared for conducting ico or the reason in another?

Author: JCBAHY
Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: Sorry, I don't quiet understand what your saying?  We have held back on announcing dates as we are focusing on building our technology and ensuring that we have what we need in place to be a successful project. We understand that this has taken longer than expected, however the ICO and crypto space is an extremely fast paced environment and therefore projects need to adapted to the environment in order to succeed. Therefore, there is no need to rush a project. We would rather hold back and ensure that we have everything in place to secure the success of the project. No highly successful company/project happened over night, there is a lot that has to happen behind the scenes for a company to become successful.  Holding back on our ICO has allowed us to not only better prepare for the next ICO, it has also allowed the company to grow and expand in ways that we never even imagined. We are growing and building stronger partnerships with huge global organisations, our RaidParty application has had so much interest from both players and developers, we have had to limit the beta to number of registrations to ensure that our servers can take the load. It also has the interest of some very cool and potentially huge games, which has allowed us to provide some very cool and big rewards and giveaways.  So I understand that it may seem that the project is going slowly, but I can ensure you that we are working extremely hard here behind the scenes.  ~ Jake Ashby, COO TriForce Tokens

Author: JCBAHY
Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: Sorry I don't quite understand.  Our pre-sale ended 31st March yes. We had set those dates in stone and our smart contracts stopped accepting any contributions after that date. We have held back on our next token sale event as we want to ensure that we have everything in place. There is no need to rush into a token sale event, when we know we have things we can improve on. Before the next token sale event, we want to ensure that we have our RaidParty mobile application launched and released, we want to ensure that we have a large player database and indie developers signed up. All of this is currently taking place, but we want to ensure that everything is in place for our next token sale event. Once we have the next token sale event dates set in stone, we will be sure to let you all know.  ~ Jake Ashby, COO TriForce Tokens

We will also be announcing a huge giveaway to one lucky player of 10 ETH! Make sure you join the facebook group, where we will announce the rules to entering the giveaway once we have launched the RaidParty application.  YOU MUST READ THE BELOW RULES BEFORE PARTICIPATING!  RULES:  1) No Bots / bot accounts / Fake accounts - any bots / bot accounts / fake accounts will be deleted and removed from the bounty campaign. 2) Do not spam the Facebook group with comments or posts - You will be deleted and removed from the bounty campaign. 3) Do not ask any bounty related questions in the facebook group, telegram group, bitcointalk ANN thread or any other form of social media - All questions must be kept to this thread only! 4) Any posts or comments must be related to the post or game related. Any posts or comments that are not related to the post or game related will be deleted and will be removed from the bounty campaign. 5) Once you have joined the group, you must remain in the group until tokens have been distributed - All bounty tokens will be distributed at the end of the final token sale event.  Failure to abide by any and all of the above rules will result in you and your stakes being removed from ALL bounty campaigns. By joining the campaign you are agreeing to have read and agreed to the above rules. We take these rules very seriously and have a 0 tolerance to those who do not abide by them.   How to join the Bounty Campaign:  In order to enter this bounty campaign you must do the following;  1) Fill out the following form: https://goo.gl/forms/vIu8DPdoz7cSqeWk2  2) Join the Facebook Group: https://www.facebook.com/groups/RaidPartyEU/  3) Remain in the group until bounty token distribution has taken place and ended.   If you would like to earn further rewards, you must download the RaidParty application upon release (expected release 7th May) and play the games that are listed on RaidParty. If you would like to join the 10 ETH giveaway, you must await further instructions on the facebook group. Further details on reward structure and how to obtain the rewards will also be shared in the group.   You can ensure you have entered the bounty campaign by checking the following spreadsheet: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1Rg1RMEJTMmTP6opSCQlIaWqdHJ6c7JNx5vHDKkQUjcA/edit?usp=sharing If you have entered the wrong information, then you must leave a message in the BOUNTY Bitcointalk thread ONLY, a member of the team will amend it when they can.   PLEASE MAKE SURE YOU HAVE READ ALL OF THE RULES!   ~ Jake Ashby, COO TriForce Tokens

Author: Kuala Lumpur
Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: How much have you collected already? As far as I know, this is just over one million dollars. The minimum allowable amount for white paper was 1 million dollars. So why did you decide to change the rules, and went the other way? Did you think that this will not be enough? Then what did you think earlier?

Author: JCBAHY
Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: We have raised around $750k. Not sure where you have over $1m from.  We have not "Changed the rules", we have done what is best for the project. Why rush something out when you can take your time to ensure that things are more successful. The ICO market is constantly evolving and therefore in order to maintain and become a successful company, the company has to evolve and adapt to the market. We have decided to hold off on the next token sale event as our technology was not ready and this extra time has allowed us to gain stronger partnerships and build and develop our tech further.  ~ Jake Ashby, COO TriForce Tokens

Author: JCBAHY
Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: Yes, there are some. Language barriers can be an issue from time to time, but I would say the main issue is the time difference. So our partners in India for example are normally awake while we are sleeping, if they have an questions or we need something changing, sometimes it take around 24-48 hours just to get a response acted upon.  But that is the reason why we want to expand our in-house team. It will allow us further control of what is produced, when and how. It will also relieve us of some language barriers and time zone frustrations.  ~ Jake Ashby, COO TriForce Tokens

Author: JCBAHY
Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: Yes our core team is very close. Our remote works, normally work on a need to know basis. This ensures that they don't reveal any of our company secrets to others and that we keep our core ideas and innovation within the business.  ~ Jake Ashby, COO TriForce Tokens

Author: JCBAHY
Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀

Author: JCBAHY
Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: We currently have 4 main people in our main office, with one more person joining us with a month or so. We also have groups of people that work remotely from all over the globe.  We are looking to expand further, but its not something that can happen over night. We need to bring people on slowly to ensure we can bring them up to speed and ensure that they can do what is expected of them before introducing someone else. We would rather do things slightly slower, but ensure that we bring on the best of the best. No point in rushing and just having problem after problem.  ~ Jake Ashby, COO TriForce Tokens

Author: JCBAHY
Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: RaidParty is TriForce Tokens's social engagement platform, designed to bring players and developers together. No matter where you are, what gaming platform you play on or own, you will always be connected to your friends and the wider gaming community.  RaidParty is a designed to break the communication barriers between gaming platforms. It also provides players and developers a new and unexplored revenue stream, meaning for players they can earn whilst playing the games they love and enjoy. Developers will have new ways to both attract and retain players, whilst increasing their revenue and monitoring player behaviour.  You can visit the RaidParty website here: https://raidparty.io  I hope that sheds some more light onto what RaidParty is.  ~ Jake Ashby, COO TriForce Tokens

Author: JCBAHY
Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: Well its down the to the developers really, but ideally we'd be encouraging them to set rewards like reaching a certain level, like level 25 and get 100 FORCE or something along those lines. We wanted the developers to also set challenges for the entire community to which they can compete for, so for example lets take Destiny 2 for example, they could set a reward for the first 10 teams to complete one of the raids within a set time.  Developers will also most likely set rewards for simply downloading and playing their game.  ~ Jake Ashby, COO TriForce Tokens

Author: JCBAHY
Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: Well our model is designed to allow players to generate revenue from their in-game activities. So, players can then cover the costs of the gaming needs, such as DLCs and in-game purchases.  ~ Jake Ashby, COO TriForce Tokens

Author: JCBAHY
Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀

Author: JCBAHY
Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: Not really. It will have a list of games which you can download, but will also reward you with FORCE (our currency). We are potentially looking into allowing players to purchase games with FORCE, but for the time being we are focusing on the task at hand.  ~ Jake Ashby, COO TriForce Tokens

Author: JCBAHY
Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: By the looks of things they are just copying us, our business model and ideas. Rather flattering to be quite honest, goes to show we are doing something right . At the end of the day however, we know that we are the true innovators and therefore we don't spend our time or energy worrying about competitors.  We are building fantastic partnerships with global organisations, with many more to come. Our partnerships with real influential people from the gaming industry, allows us access and knowledge of the gaming industry and the gamers. We are currently positioning our selves to enter and dominate the Latin American market.  Our technology, especially RaidParty has tonnes of cool features to come. Hence why we haven't been shouting about them, as our competitors are watching and listening. We need to keep some of our innovative ideas to ourselves .  ~ Jake Ashby, COO TriForce Tokens

Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: Thats difficult as we wouldn't want to devalue our own token buy working with another gaming token. We have relationships with other gaming tokens, but its not on the level of a partnership. Its more just a bit of communication here and there to see how things are going.  If the right one comes around, then we will by all means take a look serious look at a partnership. However, we haven't come across one yet and we are therefore focusing on the task at hand. Building our technology, increasing our players and developer base.  ~ Jake Ashby, COO TriForce Tokens

Author: SpockSenior
Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: Vesting period  From Wikipedia: Quote In law, vesting is to give an immediately secured right of present or future deployment. One has a vested right to an asset that cannot be taken away by any third party, even though one may not yet possess the asset. When the right, interest, or title to the present or future possession of a legal estate can be transferred to any other party, it is termed a vested interest.

Author: JCBAHY
Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: We are undergoing a new strategic plan. At the current moment in time the bounty isn't really bringing any value to the business, so while we evaluate it we have decided to put it on freeze. Thats not to say we won't continue with it, we just need to strategise the best possible methods for both our token and technology adoption. We will update everyone once we have decided what to do.  ~ Jake Ashby, COO TriForce Tokens

Once we have our team in place which will be over the next month, we will be sure to have full updates on everything for you all.  ~ Jake Ashby, COO TriForce Tokens

Author: JCBAHY
Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: The sale has now closed... obviously. We have reached our soft cap and are now pushing forward with the development and growth of our technology. We are also currently in the process of hiring some new staff to help us reach our vision. We are speaking to some very interesting individuals from a wide variety of industries and backgrounds. We are currently working on the growth of our RaidParty application, both players and developers, to which we will have more news for you soon.  As our token sale has just ended, our journey has only just started. We have a lot of work ahead of us as we move forward with our plans.  We appreciate all of the support and backing from our communities and grateful to have such a loyal and supportive community. We will be sure to keep you all updated with our process.  ~ Jake Ashby, COO TriForce Tokens

Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: TriForce Opens Sign-ups to “Raid Party” App. Receives 15,000 Sign-ups in 48 hours…  https://medium.com/@triforcetokens/triforce-opens-sign-ups-to-raid-party-app-receives-15-000-sign-ups-in-48-hours-156f2c3d4c87    TriForce Tokens are building community driven applications built on top of Ethereum to solve some common issues within the gaming industry. Specifically our solutions look to address issues around revenue generation, developer and player attraction / retention, and fostering positive communities.  As part of this mission, TriForce are launching “Raid Party”. A social engagement platform, dedicated to connecting the entire gaming community. Play and share the games you love, all whilst earning FORCE  TriForce Tokens are also in continual talks with several Indie Game Developers with several signed up to integrate with Raid Party and FORCE already.

Author: gartmah
Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: TRIFORCE,A Gaming Community Decentralised Application & Network,Player Can Build A Digital Empire.  TriForce Tokens is a decentralized platform that provides users within the online gaming community decentralized P2P trading, anti-piracy protection, and the world’s first honorary rewards system. The network will build community collaboration amongst players, whilst encouraging them to reward one another.  TriForce Tokens (FORCE), more than just a crypto-currency, has discovered a missing link within the gaming industry; a link that is causing game developers frustration on multiple levels. As it stands the gaming industry, especially the indie game sector, is losing revenue and battling with high player attrition rates. Whilst players are spending vast amounts on games and in-game purchases, they receive little in return.Honorary system will provide an added benefit to developers by tackling toxic communities that can be off-putting to new comers.  Triforce platform will deliver technology that offers game companies & players ways to trade through peer-to-peer transactions, providing both with new exciting revenue models and providing unique solutions for the gaming industry. (Supported by Coventry University Enterprises Ltd) especially the indie game sector, is losing revenue & battling with high player attrition rates. Triforce Team Aim to solve that kind of problem.  https://medium.com/@CoinsTreasure/triforce-a-gaming-community-decentralised-application-network-player-can-build-a-digital-empire-5db5383abf6

Author: Iruwen
Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: Could you explain the token sale logic to me, I'm kind of stumped here: you're selling at total of 1,500,000,000 FORCE at a rate of 6,000-7,500 FORCE/ETH. Let's assume the rate would always be 6,000 for simplicity, that would equal 250,000 ETH (at a rate of 7,000 it would still be 200,000 ETH). So this would be $200-250m. The hard cap is $20m though. This doesn't add up, the sale would be over out at around 150-200,000,000 FORCE. I don't get it, how would the 1,170,000,001 - 1,500,000,000 range ever be reached? Was the price fixed when ETH was at $100?

Author: JCBAHY
Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: There are many factors that have come into play which has effected this. For starters, when we first decided upon our hard cap, which is fixed to the price of ETH, the value of ETH was much lower. Our hard cap should really be set against a fixed amount of ETH, however we have already changed our hard cap twice and we want to refrain from consistently changing things and causing confusion.  Another reason for our hard cap being much lower than what you suggested above, is due to the community and there response. We originally set our hard cap to $60m. Since then we have had the community state that we should lower our hard cap.  The purpose of the hard cap is to stop an ICO from raising more than it needs. Our goal is $20m and therefore we have set our hard cap at $20m. Taking more than that would be greedy and unnecessary. We are here to empower the community with our technology, not take from them. We have a solid four plan which we have reviewed multiple times with many of our advisors who come from strong business backgrounds, from which we have strategically planned so that $20m covers the project for 4 years.  Due to us deciding upon the total supply back in 2017, this has also had an effect and therefore is the reason why we will be left with some many extra tokens. However, our smart contracts are designed to only mint the amount of FORCE that is purchased, meaning that if only 1m FORCE were bought, that would be all the FORCE that would exist. Rather than burning the rest of the supply, it makes more sense to only mint what is purchased. I hope that makes sense?  I understand that this may cause some confusion, but we are trying to balance between constantly changing things and causing confusion as well as getting things right. The way we see it is that, $20m is now our hard cap. That is what we need $20m to carry out our 4 year plan. Taking anymore than $20m would therefore be unnecessary.  ~ Jake Ashby, General Manager TriForce Tokens

Author: JCBAHY
Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀

Author: MichaelMeu
Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: @JCBAHY  The token metrics for this sale does not make sense.  A hardcap of $20,000,000 with available tokens for sale = 1,500,000,000 1ETH = 6,000 Force  So assuming ETH = say $950 (easy for rounding and close to current price)  Therefore token price =  $950/6000  = $0.158  So to get hardcap, multiply that by the number of tokens for sale, 1,500,000,000,  Then hardcap = 1,500,000,000,* $0.158  Which equals around $237,000,000 dollars - as opposed to $23,700,000 which is essentially your $20m hardcap advertised with the extra 3.7m discrepancy due to the eth price I chose.  Token sale figures taken directly from your website. So either a) you have an extra 0 in token supply or b) your hardcap is 10x as much as you advertise it to be.  Which is it?

Author: JCBAHY
Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: Hi Michael,  Thats a great question and point you have raised there.  There are many factors that have come into play which has effected this. For starters, when we first decided upon our hard cap, which is fixed to the price of ETH, the value of ETH was much lower. Our hard cap should really be set against a fixed amount of ETH, however we have already changed our hard cap twice and we want to refrain from consistently changing things and causing confusion.  Another reason for our hard cap being much lower than what you suggested above, is due to the community and there response. We originally set our hard cap to $60m. Since then we have had the community state that we should lower our hard cap.  The purpose of the hard cap is to stop an ICO from raising more than it needs. Our goal is $20m and therefore we have set our hard cap at $20m. Taking more than that would be greedy and unnecessary. We are here to empower the community with our technology, not take from them. We have a solid four plan which we have reviewed multiple times with many of our advisors who come from strong business backgrounds, from which we have strategically planned so that $20m covers the project for 4 years.  Due to us deciding upon the total supply back in 2017, this has also had an effect and therefore is the reason why we will be left with some many extra tokens. However, our smart contracts are designed to only mint the amount of FORCE that is purchased, meaning that if only 1m FORCE were bought, that would be all the FORCE that would exist. Rather than burning the rest of the supply, it makes more sense to only mint what is purchased. I hope that makes sense?  I understand that this may cause some confusion, but we are trying to balance between constantly changing things and causing confusion as well as getting things right. The way we see it is that, $20m is now our hard cap. That is what we need $20m to carry out our 4 year plan. Taking anymore than $20m would therefore be unnecessary.  So to answer your question, our hard cap is fixed at $20m. We will not take more than $20m. Whatever is minted, is final.  Thank you for raising this point, its a great question and I am sure it will help the rest of the community as well.  I hope I have answered your question? If there is any other questions you may have, I'd be happy to answer them.  ~ Jake Ashby, General Manager TriForce Tokens

Author: JCBAHY
Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: We have had Vadim Bulatov as an advisor now for quite a while. However he has raised a few areas where he believes there would be some synergy between TriForce Tokens and Wargaming.net. However, this is still in discussion, so I therefore am unable to disclose any further information regarding it unfortunately.  I know its frustrating, but A) we don't want to give anything away to competitors, who have already stolen pretty much every idea we have announced and B) We don't want to shoot ourselves in the foot by disclosing information until it is agreed upon with a signed agreement between both parties.  ~ Jake Ashby, General Manager TriForce Tokens

Author: MichaelMeu
Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: "Thats a great question and point you have raised there" yet no one sends me any merit   In all seriousness now, thanks for your reply and that largely makes sense.  But let's just be clear:  1) of the 2,000,000,000 tokens, none have yet been minted I assume?  2) 1ETH will remain pegged to 6,000 tokens regardless then?  3) So only 25% of total supply of all tokens minted will not be sold rather than the fixed amount of 0.5bn?  4) If above is correct, then why not just change the token limits now? (which would not the price of the hardcap) Just update things saying 1ETH = 6,000tokens, link price of ETH to USD, and have total number of tokens automatically calculated? The current approach just seems a rather roundabout way of doing things in all honesty.

Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀

Author: JCBAHY
Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: I have sent all of the merit I can at the moment, sorry.  No tokens have been minted to date, tokens will only get minted at the point of purchase in the pre-sale starting tomorrow (20th February 2018) at 12:30pm UTC.  The nominal value is 1 ETH = 6,000 FORCE, yes.  Sorry, I don't quite understand question 3.  Like I explained in my previous post, we have already changed and adapted many things within our ICO and business. To keep amending things not only takes time but it also causes confusion within the community. Regardless of the total supply available, only what is purchased will get minted. So therefore changing the total supply will have no affect anyways? What isn't purchased won't get minted and therefore will never hit the markets or anyones wallets.  I understand that it has caused some confusion, but rather than causing more confusion by making more community announcements less than 24 hours before the opening of the token sale will only have adverse affects. Our community has not raised these issues or concerns with us before and therefore we have not exerted our time or resources on amending this. We are currently focusing on delivering and producing our technology and ensuring things are up and running ready for our token sale.  ~ Jake Ashby, General Manager TriForce Tokens

In this day and age where all the info is just a click or two away, people get frustrated by having to be patient At the end it's your call on what and when to release and the right decision because you sure ass hell have a lot more to lose than we do.

Author: JCBAHY
Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: I understand that, but if we were to release every single of bit of information just because someone asked, we wouldn't have a business. Coca Cola for example, keep their recipe in a safe and very few people know the true recipe. Its called holding trading secrets, its what helps you separate yourself as a business from your competition.  It may be frustrating, but those that are truly interested in the project and want it to succeed will understand that we cannot disclose all information. We always release information when we can, but releasing information too early can be and will be detrimental to an organisation. The ICO space is extremely competitive as we have all seen, other projects have already stolen our ideas that we have released and announced, so therefore we would like to keep some to ourselves until we are ready to release them.  ~ Jake Ashby, General Manager TriForce Tokens

Author: JCBAHY
Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: For starters, our platform is not being designed for players to re-sell their games. The idea is to allow gamers to create a revenue stream through other mediums. Our business model and vision is to help game developers. By allowing re-sales of games, developers will lose out on further profits. Which goes against what we are trying to do; we are helping developers increase profits and revenue streams.  Secondly, selling of second hand games is another ball game in itself. We would have to build a system that checks the that the seller is actually providing what they are stating they are selling and that it is in a decent condition. There would also be other legal framework around that.  I'm not saying we won't ever do it. It may well be something we consider and look into in the future. But for the time being, it goes against our business model and doesn't really fall into line with what we are trying to achieve.  ~ Jake Ashby, General Manager TriForce Tokens

Author: JCBAHY

We are also speaking to others at the moment.  We are building something super cool at the minute which developers are going to love. I cannot disclose exact what it is however, due to competition.  ~ Jake Ashby, General Manager TriForce Tokens

Author: JCBAHY
Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: We are providing truly innovative solutions, that none other are providing. Unlike many other gaming ICOs, we have taken everyone within the gaming industry to mind when creating and planning our technology. We are creating a collaborative community to which every party involved benefits and profits from.  Not only do we provide players with a new and unexplored revenue stream, we also provide the same for developers, streamers and publishers. We also provide anti-piracy solutions, player behavioural analysis and much more.  We also have some amazing partnerships with extremely reputable global organisations, with more on the horizon. We also have Vadim Bulatov, head of marketing at Wargaming.net, Danny Montaner ex world champion CS:GO player and now manager of Faze Clan as well as Tyrin Davidson, ex competitive League of Legends player who was ranked in the top 200 players in Europe.  I strongly recommend reading our white paper to get a better understand of what truly makes us a game changer. You can read our white paper here: https://triforcetokens.io/resources/white-paper-v3.3.pdf  Also, I wrote an article which explains what sets us apart from other gaming projects, which you can read here: https://medium.com/triforcetokens/how-are-we-different-to-other-gaming-crypto-projects-d29eecb32616  I hope this helps.  ~ Jake Ashby, General Manager TriForce Tokens

Author: JCBAHY
Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: As an ICO, stating your token will be at X amount when it hits the market or will be X amount within X days of being on an exchange is highly illegal. No one knows how the market will take to their token, nor do they know what the price will be in 10 days time or 10 years time. Therefore they're selling you false hopes. They cannot guarantee those figures.  I would be very careful of any ICO promising that the value of the token will be X amount in X days, weeks, months or years. It is impossible to know.  The only way to approach this, from an ICOs perspective, is to increase users adoption and utility of the tokens. By increasing both of those, will have a positive affect on the tokens value. However, still you cannot tell what the value will be at a certain date or time. The crypto market is a volatile place and is prone to unexpected fluctuations. Anything can happen.  ~ Jake Ashby, General Manager TriForce Tokens

Author: Castlereagh
Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: I've been researching gaming ICOs since early December because I'm convinced it's going to be a huge market and is basically the optimal time to invest: (a) the $107 billion games industry is only getting bigger and more exciting (VR, in particular, is technology that hasn't reached its potential but is going to blow up as soon as the tech is there and affordable for consumers) (b) crypto mining is already having a dramatic knock on effect of boosting GPU development and sending money flooding to NVIDIA et al. which will drive this evolution and (c) there's a terrific synergy between crypto and gaming, and a lot of crossover between the two demographics.  I've looked at a lot of projects from GameFlip and Crycash (game item trading and incentives), Play2Live, Dreamteam and Firstblood (eSports) and The Abyss (digital distribution). My gut sense is that there are so many niches in gaming that there is space for a relatively high number of successful blockchain services. That being said, speaking as an avid gamer myself, the project that has impressed me the most as an end user so far has been this one.  For me the key USPs that make TriforceTokens stand out are: Their honour system shows they have a real respect for community in gaming and are making it a core priority, which - let's face it - is the cornerstone of the whole thing. They want to promote collaboration and  positive interactions in the gaming community with their ecosystem, which I think is imperative. The wrong incentive system could turn the whole thing into a toxic play2win farm-a-thon with everyone out for themselves- and so it strikes me that TriforceTokens is doing the right thing in keeping the gaming experience at the heart of their project. People are going to want to be on the platform where the community is top notch, not just where the biggest numbers initially are. As a connected note, I think it's very promising how seriously they are taking the market research side of things - drawing upon big data and behavioural analysis, so they can deliver what we, as gamers, actually want, as the project develops and evolves Likewise, I think their relatively modest company size makes them a lot more agile in this regard - allowing them to actively listen to and respond to the community (they are not a huge, faceless multinational that only looks at the quant charts). In fact, judging from the social media, many of the team are avid gamers themselves... so it's refreshing to have people with a personal stake in the industry at the helm of a project like this They care about indie games and developers, not only by prioritising making their platform available to the smaller players too, but also with respect to their approach to piracy. TFT could end up being an affordable anti-piracy solution that would allow even small developers to safeguard their revenue.  All of which says to me that, although TFT may not be the biggest player in the market currently - they are showing all the right signs of being able to deliver something truly revolutionary that, in addition to helping boost developers' revenue, will reflect what gamers actually want, and that IMPROVES the gaming experience, rather than detracts from it. And the gamer in me is very excited about that.

Author: JCBAHY
Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: Hi, thank you for your kind comments. No worries, please see the article below which I wrote specifically answering this question  https://medium.com/triforcetokens/how-are-we-different-to-other-gaming-crypto-projects-d29eecb32616  ~ Jake Ashby, General Manager TriForce Tokens

Author: JCBAHY
Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: Yes that is correct, 75% is available to the public in the token sale events. Any that aren't sold will be burnt. The rest of the supply, 25% is split between the team and advisors. All team tokens and advisory tokens are on lock for at-least 3 months. Those with a larger percentage of the 25% have the majority of their tokens locked for around 12 Months minimum. Although none of our team will be dumping, we just need to be sure so we have put measure in place to prevent that.  ~ Jake Ashby, General Manager TriForce Tokens

Author: JCBAHY
Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: Whatever is not sold will be burnt. We will only keep 25% of the tokens that are sold for the team. So imagine 100 tokens are sold to the public, the team would keep 25 tokens, so the total supply of tokens will be 125. The rest will be burnt.  ~ Jake Ashby, General Manager TriForce Tokens

Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: Jake, can you please give some more info on the beta? This might be a n00b question but will it be limited to one gaming platform (or is that a really a stupid question XD)? So we will basically be able to play any of our games and stream it for others to watch them? I am really into the whole idea and can't wait to try it out!

Author: JCBAHY
Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: No its fine.  The platform is a social engagement platform, so similar to Facebook or Twitter, however it is solely designed for the gaming community. You will be able to connect with friends and the wider community, sharing your progress and achievements. You will be able to discover new developers and games, as well as make new friends. Developers will be able to set rewards, challenges, tasks and achievements for players to which they can attached FORCE (our currency) as a reward. Players will be able to reward one another for help and assistance.  The beta platform will be released on mobile, but the platform will integrate with all gaming platforms, consoles & PC. The idea of is to bridge the gap between consoles and consoles and pc. The reasons for it being on mobile is so that no matter where you are, what console or platform you plan on, you are always connected with your friends and the wider community.  There are tonnes of other cool features we are adding, but unfortunately due to some competition we have to keep our ideas very close to our chests. We have already had a few competitors steal our ideas, so we just want to play it safe for now.  Closer to launch, we will release information about its innovative features  ~ Jake Ashby, General Manager TriForce Tokens

Author: MihailJ
Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: Why is the KYC/AML process so important?  Reading through many ICO telegram groups, it’s quite daunting to see that many self-proclaimed “Real” ICOs aren’t implementing or straight up refuse to implement a KYC or AML process.  One comment I read today was rather deluded and worrisome:  “KYC reduces no. of investors… and there is no need for KYC for an ICO…”  They continued with:  “There are so many scam ICOs that demand KYC and then the documents are forged… so stay alert. Don’t risk ur identity for a few bucks.”  Now, to some with very little knowledge within the crypto space, this would sound like a reasonable reason for an ICO to not implement a KYC or an AML process. However, being in and surrounded by the crypto space this rings alarm bells.  Our advice: Be very wary of any ICOs or projects that do not have and argue against implementing a KYC or AML process.  https://medium.com/@triforcetokens/why-is-the-kyc-aml-process-so-important-959e721d68f7

Author: JCBAHY
Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: Thanks for sharing that!  ~ Jake Ashby, General Manager TriForce Tokens

Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀

Author: JCBAHY
Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: KYC and AML processes should be implemented for all token sales and by any organisation thats raising funds. Its a measure that helps protect the project/organisation as well as the investors/contributors.  As the crypto space is unregulated, it means that all ICOs should partake in some form of self-regulation.  We would advise to be wary and avoid any ICOs that don't follow this procedure. Those that don't follow the procedure clearly have no interest in the long term success of their project nor the projection of their contributors.  ~ Jake Ashby, General Manager TriForce Tokens

Author: JCBAHY
Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: It has helped the industry and I agree that it has helped many gamers by allowing them to play games they cannot afford. Thats why we are working closely with Coventry University to research this area to ensure we provide a fair and profitable solution. We aren't just going to release something that just straight up denies piracy. We want to better understand the reasons behind why people pirate so that we can provide innovative solutions.  We are also creating new revenue models which will allow players to generate an income from the games they love and enjoy playing. This will also help those within countries that struggle to afford the games they want and desire.  We are passionate about what we do and we want to ensure that we take everyone into consideration. We want to build a gaming community that everyone benefits from.  ~ Jake Ashby, General Manager TriForce Tokens

Plus for those not interested in the game I'm playing, I'll be playing from the office like Jake mentioned, so you can get a sneak peek into our daily working lives here aiming to make sure TriForce transitions into a successful presale. We pretty much live in the office right now so expect long streams!   My stream can be found here: https://www.twitch.tv/dandychap  See you tomorrow for anyone interested!  ~ Tyrin Davidson, Community Support TriForce Tokens

Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀

It was a minor mistake at the time of registration and there are no issues to be concerned about now.   ~ Raza Ahmed, CTO TriForce Tokens

TriForce Tokens is here to revolutionise the gaming industry, we are in this for the long haul.  ~ Jake Ashby, General Manager TriForce Tokens

Author: H. Veron
Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: TriForce Tokens, more than just a crypto-currency, has discovered a missing link within the gaming industry; a link that is causing game developers frustration on multiple levels. As it stands the gaming industry, especially the indie game sector, is losing revenue and battling with high player attrition rates. Whilst players are spending vast amounts on games and in-game purchases, they receive little in return. TriForce Tokens aims to solve this problem.

Author: JCBAHY
Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: **** THE WHITELIST IS NOW OPEN ****    The Whitelist Process is now open here: www.triforcetokens.io/join-whitelist  Every contributor needs to complete this process in order to buy FORCE tokens opening on 20th February at 12:30pm UTC.  A full guide on the process can be found here: http://bit.ly/2DozPyN  The process will only take around 5 minutes, but you need to make sure you will have the following ready:  1) An ERC-20 compatible Ethereum wallet - for both sending your ETH and receiving FORCE (do not use exchanges)  2) A valid form of ID: Passport, National ID or Driver's Licence will be acceptable  3) A selfie image for face recognition against your ID in step 2  Make sure your image files are smaller than 4MB in size. File must be one of the following, .jpg, . jpeg, .png or .gif.  If you are unsure about what wallet to have setup (for step 1), we recommend using MyEtherWallet. A full user guide is available here: http://bit.ly/2B1gCOm  If you are a US investor, we can only accept accredited investors having assets of over $1m, and you must complete the following form to be accepted: http://bit.ly/2r33to8  You can subscribe to us at www.triforcetokens.io and join our telegram channel at t.me/triforcetokens  ~ Jake Ashby, General Manager TriForce Tokens

Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: In order to better understand the true potential of TriForce Tokens its best to check out our white paper, it's too much to explain in one message Heres a link: https://triforcetokens.io/resources/white-paper-v3.3.pdf  You can also check out a cool article I wrote here: https://medium.com/triforcetokens/how-are-we-different-to-other-gaming-crypto-projects-d29eecb32616  ~ Jake Ashby, General Manager TriForce Tokens

Author: JCBAHY
Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: Thats not what we meant by developer rewards, but yes that too. What we meant was that developers can set tasks or goals for players to which upon completion they receive rewards in FORCE. So a developer might set a reward for the first 10 people to complete a raid in Destiny 2 for example, the first 10 players to complete the raid would then be rewarded 100 FORCE each (As an example).  ~ Jake Ashby, General Manager TriForce Tokens

Author: JCBAHY
Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: I'm sure there is on PC. I play on consoles mainly which I would argue is a lot harder to cheat on, most people that cheat on consoles normally glitch rather than have mods like aim bots. The games itself on Xbox is still extremely buggy, the frame rate is shocking, i think its still 30 FPS. Not the mention the rendering. You'll land some where run inside a building and all of a sudden find yourself trapped in a room that you can't get in or out of it.  But other than that, its still an awesome game. Nothing more satisfying that getting a Winner Winner Chicken Dinner!  I would defo recommend the game to anyone that hasn't yet played it.  ~ Jake Ashby, General Manager TriForce Tokens

Author: JCBAHY
Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: I wouldn't say that the community is decline, I would say that due to new communication channels and methods, the community is a lot more wide spread. So in the case of any ICOs, you need to cast your net wide to cover as many forms of social communication channel to create an only awareness. The down side to that unfortunately is that it then becomes extremely expensive  Its knowing where to go and how to target your audience in order to build your community and following.  ~ Jake Ashby, General Manager TriForce Tokens

Author: JCBAHY
Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: Oh okay sorry. But yes, I see what you are saying. But even then you could argue that gamer profiles are now spread across multiple devices, with the introduction of mobile phones and mobile games, players are able to game at any time, no matter where they are. So, again I guess you can argue that the decline may be noticeable across certain devices, whilst increasing in others. The global games market is huge and growing by 6.2% year on year, so I think its hard to argue that its decreasing.  But you do raise a good point. Thats why TriForce Tokens wants to give back the power the community allowing gamers to create their own wealth through their favourite hobbies, gaming.  ~ Jake Ashby, General Manager TriForce Tokens

Author: TyrellWellick
Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: Gamers around the world would like to have this project hit the market, as we all know. We gamers spent hundreds of hundreds of hours in front of our PCs playing our favored/desired game to play and actually not gaining any fiat or cryptocurrency in exchange from it. We all know steam products have 'markets' wherein we gamers could buy and sell our way into profit but it doesn't really mean that we are gaining all the time whilst playing.  Triforce proposes exactly what we gamers crave in exchange of our unrelenting devotion towards our beloved gaming community, we as well would like to be commended as to how we approach and support our community, this kind of project suits the gaming platform we gamers need, excluded from scammers and hackers into a manageable level. We hope this project would be a success, with high caliber people group of people, giving team effort and devotion towards the project; together with the community's support.  All the best Triforce!

Author: JCBAHY
Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: Our entire vision and business plan has been based around helping and assisting indie game developers. We plan on going to larger development companies as well, but its always best to start small and grow bigger. Trying to target such a large market instantly is extremely challenging and risky. Its best to start small and work your way up, building foundations as you go so you can create stability.  ~ Jake Ashby, General Manager TriForce Tokens

Author: JCBAHY
Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀

Author: JCBAHY

Author: JCBAHY
Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: The project started to gain traction and development around September time. But you have to understand that many of the team were only working part-time on TriForce Tokens at the time due to other commitments. More of the team are now full team, meaning we are able to start pushing our project forward and upwards.  ~ Jake Ashby, General Manager TriForce Tokens

Author: JCBAHY
Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: **TriForceTokens is pleased to announce that Danny ‘fRoD’ Montaner has joined the team as an advisor.**   Danny is a former Counter Strike player, playing professionally for over 12 years, playing at highest level of competition, including winning multiple World Championships. His other accolades include Counter Strike Player of the Year ’05, and NA Player of the Decade. Known as ‘the greatest American Counter Strike player of all time’, Danny has had an extremely successful career in Counter Strike.  Ever since retiring, he has been getting more involved in eSports and has held positions through his consultancy managing and coaching for FaZe Clan, Florida International University, and more. With a financial background, he is now looking to make a splash in the Cryptocurrency/ICO space.  Statement by Danny:  “TriForce Tokens quickly caught my attention with the aim at being a community centered token. Not only is there various forms of protection and security, there is everything you would need to engage in your community. Also, it is important to note that there are multiple sources of revenue generation that is untapped for any content creator and developer. This is something the industry lacks as there are no profitable solutions to engage in the community, while growing it and securing it. TriForce Tokens not only seems to solve a lot of these issues, but also implement an honorary system to keep the community fun and safe for everyone.”  Danny’s deep knowledge and experience within the gaming industry will be a huge asset to us that we aim to make the best use of to guarantee the growth and success for TriForce Tokens, and we look forward to working with him.  ~ Jake Ashby, General Manager TriForce Tokens

Author: JCBAHY
Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: What sets TriForce Tokens aside from the rest?  TriForce Tokens pools all your virtual assets into a single ecosystem – independent of game, studio, developer or platform. That means new ways to play and new ways to profit: help others to level up, join raids, trade virtual assets, use them on different games, earn rewards from in-game bounties – even earn from your gaming skills. TriForce Tokens is powering new monetization opportunities in a positive and profitable community of gamers.  Here are three aspects that really make TriForce Tokens unique:  **Unexplored Revenue Streams** – Creating a community everyone benefits from. Our technology stack will provide new revenue streams to both players, developers and publishers. These revenue streams will range from transfer fees placed by developers, honey pots and our honouree reward system to name a few. Our honouree reward system will not only allow the transfer of FORCE between players, but it will also encourage and foster collaborative behaviour. The honouree system is designed to allow players to send/donate FORCE to one another in exchange for assistance, support or guidance.  **Anti-Piracy Engine** – Piracy is affecting the entire entertainment industry, all though it cannot be eradicated; there are measures that can be taken to reduce it. TriForce Tokens working alongside Coventry University aims to provide real world solutions to help minimise and combat piracy within the gaming industry. Our Piracy engine and solutions are an on-going research project to ensure that our technology and solutions are up-to-date and sound at all times.  **Social Engagement Platform** – As part of our efforts to create a collaborative and cohesive gaming community, we are currently in the works of building a social engagement platform that brings the entire gaming community under one roof. No longer will there be barriers between console and PC communication, our platform will allow players to community at anytime, anywhere. Packed with tonnes of cool features, our platform will definitely be a game changer. As part of the platform, our technology will track player behaviour which it will analyse and provide to game developers allowing them to better understand the needs, wants and desires of their chosen audience.  These are 3 main aspects that sets TriForce Tokens apart, but it doesn’t stop there. Be sure to check out our white paper to delve deeper into what really makes TriForce Tokens a game changer: https://triforcetokens.io/resources/white-paper-v3.3.pdf  ~ Jake Ashby, General Manager TriForce Tokens

Author: JCBAHY
Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: **** IMPORTANT UPDATE: KYC/WHITELIST APPLICATION IS NOW LIVE! ****  **BE SURE TO SECURE YOUR PLACE: LIMITED TO 2,000 PARTICIPANTS!**  **YOU MUST FILL OUT THIS APPLICATION FORM IF YOU WISH TO BUY FORCE TOKENS**   PLEASE READ:  This is a message to all those who are interested in contributing towards our next token sale event on 20th February 2018 12:30pm UTC until 6th March 2018 12:30pm UTC. In order to participate, you MUST fill out this 5 minute KYC (Know Your Customer) application form in order to be granted access to the whitelist (list of approved contributors). If you are not on the whitelist, you will be unable to contribute towards the token sale and therefore will not be able to purchase FORCE.  ** THIS PROCESS IS MANDATORY FOR IF YOU WANT TO PURCHASE FORCE **  We recommend following our Purchase Guide, it will give you a step by step guide to completing your KYC application: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1mEdDvIR5GSFPqZ0nvmpz6ZvvVZWkr4XOe7ww0NFWQrI/edit#   WHAT WILL I NEED?  The process will only take around 5 minutes, but you need to make sure you will have the following ready:  1) An ERC-20 compatible Ethereum wallet - for both sending your ETH and receiving FORCE (do not use exchanges)  **Your ethereum wallet MUST BE ERC-20 compatible and you must have access to the private key. For example you can use Ledger Nano S, MetaMask, Mist and of course MyEtherWallet.**  2) A valid form of ID: Passport, National ID or Drivers Licence will be acceptable 3) A selfie image for face recognition against your ID in step 2  Make sure your image files are smaller than 4MB in size.   I DON'T HAVE A ERC-20 WALLET, HELP?  If you are unsure about what wallet to have setup (for step 1), we recommend using MyEtherWallet. A full user guide is available here: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1BriLzrcOOloLyUcqeUr0ZpZhGXkYJc3OejKh99Tzfew/edit?usp=sharing   I'M FROM THE US, CAN I CONTRIBUTE?  If you are a US investor, we can only accept accredited investors of this type, and you must complete the following form to be accepted: https://goo.gl/forms/jr6MSPSfC1QC4gdI3    ARE YOU READY TO START YOUR APPLICATION?  START HERE: https://triforcetokens.io/join-whitelist    I'M HAVING ISSUES, HELP!?  Please free feel to PM us at either of the following on telegram: @Petemardell @JakeAshby    ~ Jake Ashby, General Manager TriForce Tokens

Author: mrpetem
Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: We had some issues with our KYC process earlier, stopping people from being able to actually get through. We have now since resolved this and people are getting approved now.  To make sure the process goes through smooth, please make sure of the following:  1) Image Quality - Be sure to take clear images of both your ID and yourself. Blurry or pixelated images will be rejected. Also ensure that your ID and face are centred in the image and oriented in an up right position.  2) Image Size - Ensure that your image size is less than 4MB.  3) Image Orientation - Ensure that your image is the correct way up when uploading. For example: an image of your face taken horizontally is not being uploaded vertically.  4) Image File Type - The only accepted file types or .jpg, .jpeg, .png and .gif  If you are still being rejected, please PM @JakeAshby or @Petemardell in telegram providing your:  1) Email Address 2) Photo of ID 3) Selfie  We will pass this information onto our screening providers who will conduct a manual review. Be aware that this process will take longer.  Please be aware that we are unable to bypass this process for you, so you must attempt it first before contacting one of us.  You can now start the whitelist and get approved to buy some FORCE tokens: https://triforcetokens.io/join-whitelist  ~ Pete Mardell, CEO TriForce Tokens

Author: JCBAHY

Author: JCBAHY
Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: Yes I also believe that MMORPGs will be those that benefit the best from our technology. But thats not to say that others wont, the use for our technology is literally limitless, you wouldn't necessarily need to use it just to seek help or assistance. Lets say for example you consider yourself a god at Forza, Gran Turismo or Fifa, you might be looking to compete against others or simply just find someone more challenging to play.  But yet again, due to competition I cannot disclose much more information on our ideas to expand to the uses and features of the platform. Annoying I know, I really want to be able to tell you guys but we have already had ideas stolen/copied, which means we need to keep our innovation within the company now. Trade secrets and all that.  ~ Jake Ashby, General Manager TriForce Tokens

Author: JCBAHY
Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: No steam is more of a game store rather than a social engagement platform. It has elements of a social engagement platform, but that is not its main focus. SiFuTheMonk is correct in a sense. See my comment:  Quote from: JCBAHY on January 16, 2018, 09:42:24 AM Similar yes, but it is designed for the gaming community and industry. It will hold features that facebook and twitter won't.  Of course, we are unable to disclose too much information due to competitors.  ~ Jake Ashby, General Manager TriForce Tokens  It is designed to be a form of communication for the entire gaming community/industry. It is designed to break the barriers of communication between consoles, PCs and mobiles. Meaning that no matter where you are, what gaming platform you are on or own, you will still be able to communicate with your friends and the wider community.  Of course, it will have tonnes of cool features as well meaning it will be more than just a communications platform. But we are unable to disclose any more information.  ~ Jake Ashby, General Manager TriForce Tokens

Author: JCBAHY
Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: **** What makes our project unique? ****  TriForce Tokens pools all your virtual assets into a single ecosystem – independent of game, studio, developer or platform. That means new ways to play and new ways to profit: help others to level up, join raids, trade virtual assets, use them on different games, earn rewards from in-game bounties – even earn from your gaming skills. TriForce Tokens is powering new monetization opportunities in a positive and profitable community of gamers.  Here are three aspects that really make TriForce Tokens unique:  **Unexplored Revenue Streams** – Creating a community everyone benefits from. Our technology stack will provide new revenue streams to both players, developers and publishers. These revenue streams will range from transfer fees placed by developers, honey pots and our honouree reward system to name a few. Our honouree reward system will not only allow the transfer of FORCE between players, but it will also encourage and foster collaborative behaviour. The honouree system is designed to allow players to send/donate FORCE to one another in exchange for assistance, support or guidance.  **Anti-Piracy Engine** – Piracy is affecting the entire entertainment industry, all though it cannot be eradicated; there are measures that can be taken to reduce it. TriForce Tokens working alongside Coventry University aims to provide real world solutions to help minimise and combat piracy within the gaming industry. Our Piracy engine and solutions are an on-going research project to ensure that our technology and solutions are up-to-date and sound at all times.  **Social Engagement Platform Mobile App** – As part of our efforts to create a collaborative and cohesive gaming community, we are currently in the works of building a social engagement platform that brings the entire gaming community under one roof. No longer will there be barriers between console and PC communication, our platform will allow players to community at anytime, anywhere. Packed with tonnes of cool features, our platform will definitely be a game changer. As part of the platform, our technology will track player behaviour which it will analyse and provide to game developers allowing them to better understand the needs, wants and desires of their chosen audience.  These are 3 main aspects that sets TriForce Tokens apart, but it doesn’t stop there. Be sure to check out our white paper to delve deeper into what really makes TriForce Tokens a game changer: https://triforcetokens.io/resources/white-paper-v3.3.pdf  ~ Jake Ashby, General Manager TriForce Tokens

Author: JCBAHY
Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: The hard cap is set at $60m. We have set it to $60m as this amount would allow us to carry out all of our plans with a lot of room for manoeuvre. Taking more than $60m would be unnecessary and quite frankly greedy. We don't want to take more than we need from the community, as our entire vision and existence stands for giving back to the community.  I hope that sheds some more light on our hard cap for you. Please feel free to check out our website and white paper for more information:  Website - https://triforcetokens.io/ White paper - https://triforcetokens.io/resources/white-paper-v3.3.pdf  ~ Jake Ashby, General Manager TriForce Tokens

Author: Raza_TFT
Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: CTO - Technical Update  Good day everyone, my name is Raza and I am the CTO at TriForce Tokens. I rarely make an appearance on our social channels so I thought it would be worth saying a quick hello and giving an update on the developments the tech team have made.  Firstly, our Smart Contracts are now available on github, deployed on testnet and ready to deploy on the mainnet. For any technical reviewers you can take a look on our github repo here: https://github.com/TriForceNetwork/TokenSaleContracts  We are also offering a bug bounty, should you happen to come across potential issues that you can submit to us on our bounty thread on bitcointalk: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2236918 You will receive a number of stakes in the bounty programme determined by the severity of the bug found.  With regards to our central intelligence API hub and developer portal, these are well underway and we aim to have an initial release prior to our token sale launch on 20th February. This hub is the glue for the entire stack being built and will help us secure many opportunities from companies that have reached out to us so far.  Our social games engagement mobile app, RaidParty is also being developed and again aim to have a preliminary release prior to 20th February. This application is going to give players a way of helping each other out in exchange for rewards and will be connected to the intelligence hub.  There are a few other tricks up our sleeves but due to competitors we are not prepared to release further information as we suspect some have been taking our ideas. In some ways it's a great sign that we are the real innovators and our research has paid off. We are confident though that being leaders in this space means we will always be one step ahead of projects that do this.  Finally, thank you to the support everyone has given from the community and all the ideas that have been sent our way. Having a strong community is the heart and soul of this project.  ~ Raza Ahmed, CTO TriForce Tokens

Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: Once we get to that point it would be implemented with verification processes e.g. credit card   Quote from: Uthred on January 13, 2018, 01:31:44 PM Quote from: mrpetem on January 13, 2018, 11:47:54 AM Quote from: Vindizzle on January 13, 2018, 11:16:17 AM Since you mentioned gambling before,and in some countries gambling is illegal,how you plan to sort that out?  We will only be able to offer those services as long as it fits within regulatory requirements and the law, so yes there would be restrictions for those countries that do.  ~ Pete Mardell, CEO TriForce Tokens  Can we expect then localisation for each country?  Yes absolutely - it's the usual practice.   Quote from: CillaryHlinton on January 13, 2018, 01:33:29 PM Will the platform offer some popup overlay messages when lets say there's an action in the background?  That is getting very specific  We can't hash out details like that just yet, those kind of things happen after core functionality is in place. We will be developing in an iterative process (LEAN methodology).   Quote from: Xallid on January 13, 2018, 02:22:37 PM Is it going to be possible to appear offline?For those times where you just want to chill by yourself and not be bothered by anyone?  Not really, the whole network is about being engaged with the community so this wouldn't fall into our focus. I get what you are saying though.   ~ Pete Mardell, CEO TriForce Tokens

If you are unsure about what wallet to have setup (for step 1), we recommend using MyEtherWallet. A full user guide is available here: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1BriLzrcOOloLyUcqeUr0ZpZhGXkYJc3OejKh99Tzfew/edit?usp=sharing  If you are a US investor, we can only accept accredited investors of this type, and you must complete the following form to be accepted: https://goo.gl/forms/jr6MSPSfC1QC4gdI3  The whitelisting will be open on Tuesday 16th January, so make sure to put it in your diaries and reserve your spot!  If you have any questions feel free to ask in our telegram channel https://t.me/triforcetokens   ~ Pete Mardell, CEO TriForce Tokens

Author: JCBAHY
Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: Know your customer ('KYC') is the process of a business identifying and verifying the identity of its clients.[1] The term is also used to refer to the bank and anti-money laundering regulations which governs these activities.  In order to abide by many countries legislation and regulations, they now require you to conduct or implement a KYC process before allowing anyone to contribute towards your ICO. It is a good practice that any good and legitimate ICO will implement.  As long as you are not trying to launder money or you are on some government watchlist, you have nothing to worry about. It is a simple 5 minute process that will just ask for some of your details and for some government issued ID. Once you have completed and your details have been cross referenced with government databases, if all is okay and we get the green light, you will be added to the whitelist. The whitelist is a list of approved contributors. In order to participate in the token sale, you need to be on the whitelist.  You should be quick however, as we have limited spaces on the whitelist. Only 2,000 participants at this point.  You will be able to start the KYC process as of the 16th January 2018. Be sure to subscribe to our emails on our website https://triforcetokens.io to ensure you are kept up-to-date.  ~ Jake Ashby, General Manager TriForce Tokens

Author: NastyaSilvera
Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: The system performs several functions at once. On the one hand, KYC gives the financial structure the opportunity to protect its interests: 1) it certifies the identity of the client; 2) allows the security service to determine the degree of risk of involving the client in illegal activities (a priori it is considered that every single client is subject to such risk); 3) allows, in order to manage its own risks, to establish a filter regulating the type and number of transactions for a specific client; 4) allows you to track unusual client transactions and, if necessary, initiate their investigation.

Author: JCBAHY
Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: **** What makes our project unique? ****  TriForce Tokens is a project that will empower every party within the gaming industry. Its vision is to encourage a collaborative and cohesive gaming community, a more socially interactive community that everyone benefits from.  Here are three aspects that really make TriForce Tokens unique:  **Unexplored Revenue Streams** – As part of our plan to create a community everyone benefits from, we also want to make the community profitable for everyone involved. Our technology stack will provide new revenue streams to both players, streamers, developers and publishers. These revenue streams will range from transfer fees placed by developers, honey pots and our honouree reward system to name a few. Our honouree reward system will not only allow the transfer of FORCE between players, but it will also encourage and foster collaborative behaviour. The honouree system is designed to allow players to send/donate FORCE to one another in exchange for assistance, support or guidance.  **Anti-Piracy Engine** – Piracy is affecting the entire entertainment industry, all though it cannot be eradicated; there are measures that can be taken to reduce it. TriForce Tokens working alongside Coventry University aims to provide real world solutions to help minimise and combat piracy within the gaming industry. Our Piracy engine and solutions are an on-going research project to ensure that our technology and solutions are up-to-date and sound at all times.  **Social Engagement Platform** – As part of our efforts to create a collaborative and cohesive gaming community, we are currently in the works of building a social engagement platform that brings the entire gaming community under one roof. No longer will there be barriers between console and PC communication, our platform will allow players to community at anytime, anywhere. Packed with tonnes of cool features, our platform will definitely be a game changer. As part of the platform, our technology will track player behaviour which it will analyse and provide to game developers allowing them to better understand the needs, wants and desires of their chosen audience.  These are 3 main aspects that sets TriForce Tokens apart, but it doesn’t stop there. Be sure to check out our white paper to delve deeper into what really makes TriForce Tokens a game changer: https://triforcetokens.io/resources/white-paper-v3.3.pdf

Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: Our technology is not designed to host games. It is designed to break the barrier of communication between gaming platforms. Further down the line we have plans to produce and host some of our own games, but that is much further down the line. Regarding our technology being cross platform, yes it will allow players to communicate regarding what platform they are on or where they are. Our BETA release of our platform will be for mobile, iOS and Android to be specific. This means that no matter where you are or what you are doing, you will always be in the loop. It will allow you to communicate with your friends and gaming community, regardless of what platforms you have.  ~ Jake Ashby, General Manager TriForce Tokens

Author: mrpetem
Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: Thanks for pointing out the typo's Zendalet, will get these corrected. Can't believe we missed those as it has been audited/reviewed by a lot of people. With regards to image usage this is confirmed fair usage by our design team as it does not include game text/content and are modified, not really because of our TIGA membership. I will let Jake respond to the rest though since you replied to him  ~ Pete Mardell, CEO TriForce Tokens

Author: JCBAHY
Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: I am glad you have taken the time to read through our white paper, I hope it has shed further light on what it is we do and are about. Also, thank you for spotting those errors, we will make sure we amend them ASAP.  Regarding our goals, yes our scope is much wider. Hence why we always recommend to anyone interested in TriForce Tokens that they read through our white paper and website, to get a better understanding of the company, it's culture and it's values. May I add that we are not necessarily attempting to replace current models, but rather complement and work alongside. Our aim is to create a collaborative and profitable community for every party involved, from the player to the developer.  Please let us know if you have any further questions regarding our company, products or services, or anything else we can help you with.  Once again, thank you for taking your time to read through our white paper, I hope it was most insightful and lastly, thank you for your support of TriForce Tokens.  ~ Jake Ashby, General Manager TriForce Tokens

Meanwhile it is already a prominent feature of virtual game Second Life, nestled within a new Cryptocurrency Information Center. Author: mrpetem
Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: Hi Baltman,  I can assure you other projects are not tackling this industry in the same way we are. Most of them are focused on digital goods being traded between each other or buying games.. they aren't looking at the social aspects and collaboration between players or ways for developers to reduce their player dropout. This isn't to say other projects are worse than us, just that there is a difference in approach between us.  Plus as I have mentioned before, based on the conversations, research and surveys conducted within the industry we have a real demand for our solutions - which is pushing the team to get our tech released so we can start onboarding these companies.  ~ Pete Mardell, CEO TriForce Tokens

Author: mrpetem
Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: Just want to clarify here, that tackling piracy is a huge challenge and we have never claimed to solve it. What we are doing is setting up a research framework with the University to study it and then look at how blockchain can help to reduce it - to the point of saving developers from losing revenue. We do have some concepts that need a lot of backing to be able to adeqately benchmark it against studies - it's going to require a lot of data crunching, analysis and stress testing.  There are other benefits to this beyond trying to resolve a near impossible issue such as being resourced by a University, networking opportunities (in terms of business development) and here in the UK there are specific tax benefits too. This is another aspect that sets us apart, we are considering business strategies that other projects probably don't think about. This is all part of establishing our four year growth strategy  ~ Pete Mardell, CEO TriForce Tokens
