Author: mrpetem
Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: Not yet  When we complete our token sales our first task is to bring on a head of HR so we can conduct thorough recruitment processes and attract the best talent in the UK. Due to my experience in this industry we are going to have the most awesome environment and routes to bringing people on board. Not sure how other projects look at this, but the success of any business is tied a lot to the work force and company culture. We will have a full careers site up as well for our openings when it happens.  ~ Pete Mardell, CEO TriForce Tokens

Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: When I took part in the pre-sale, one ETH was worth 335 USD or 1675 tokens without the bonus. Now you are quadrupling the amount of tokens, so the tokens in my account should quadruple, too. Which would be 6700 tokens per ETH without bonus. With the 60% presale bonus this would be 10720 tokens per ETH. But you only talk about 7500 tokens per ETH at the new max 25% bonus. So, are you taking away our pre-sale bonus now? I would feel cheated then.

Author: mrpetem
Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: Hi JadawinUK,  Do not worry, we are not going to cheat our pre-sale contributors We value all of our supporters and are going to of course increase the rates to reflect this new change with earlier contributors to match the new rate. So you will have your original contribution set to the new nominal value of 6,000 TFT per ETH plus the original bonus that you was awarded before. We did mention this briefly in the email to our supporters and also that we will be following up with our existing contributors once the update has been made.   However, since we are fixing the value to 1 ETH instead of dollar value, it won't be set to what the dollar value was of the ETH at the time. There are arguments for and against this I appreciate that, however we have to consider that it is now being fixed to Ethereum and with that comes fluctuations in fiat value. Hopefully this is an understandable position.  ~ Pete Mardell, CEO TriForce Tokens

Author: gpower
Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: It is working to be the first UK compliant ICO.  What does this mean?

Author: mrpetem
Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: Hi gpower,  This has since been updated in our white paper, but in short, at the time there had been no compliant UK based ICO. We meet all requirements for conducting a token sale within the UK having had meetings with FCA representatives to be sure on this. We are also working toward Cyber Essentials Plus certification and ISO27001 certification. These are regulatory frameworks that ensure measures are in place for protection of consumer data, systems and overall IT infrastructure.  Hope this helps.  ~ Pete Mardell, CEO TriForce Tokens

Author: mrpetem
Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: We can now officially announce Vadim Bulatov, head of marketing at Wargaming in joining our games industry advisory board, and he is our first member.  Vadim actually approached me directly a couple of weeks ago, as a lot of what he does aligns with our own principles of fostering collaborative gaming communities. It's great to have him available to advise us on routes to market, strategy etc.  Our full article is up on medium: https://medium.com/triforcetokens/games-industry-adviser-vadim-bulatov-joins-triforce-tokens-14157ac5c7da  He has worked on some big name titles, such as world of tanks, world of warships etc that has over 110 million players globally.  ~ Pete Mardell, CEO TriForce Tokens

Author: Ex_Skinrbox
Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: Found out about Triforce Tokens offering yesterday, so unfortunately missed the Pre Sale.  It didn't go as you had planned but your vision is in my view excellent and apologies I'm going to use the that word, 'disruptive', when it comes to gaming; the idea that players can Play To Earn (real money!) is a game changer, especially when publishers are pushing Pay to Win micro transactions/loot boxes.  I'd advise on staying clear from scientific revenue and dynamic pricing algorithms, stay ethical and gamers will come.  You have done a really good professional job on planning your ICO, from a technical perspective,  but one area lacking is that TFT and it's great message is unknown in gaming circles.  Getting a recognised industry name on board is a good start. I'd also recommend connecting with Youtube game bloggers such as Boogie2988, Jim Sterling, Angry Joe, Total Biscuit and game news/Media channels such as The Know; so as to spread the TFT vision and platform and at the very least get gamers talking about it and possibly reading the white paper.            From a delivery perspective how well is the beta development going?  Some positive news on this or current rollout out plan details before the ICO will definitely put confidence in perspective buyers.   Also if you can get game developers/publishers agreements finalised and in position to talk about them and get this message out to the games media (such as above) prior to ICO, will strengthen the chance of success on the upcoming ICO.  Well done on what you have accomplished so far and looking forward to seeing your vision realised.

Author: CisColtz
Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: Congratz team for the pre-sale end , I hope it went well cause I love triforce token and I do my best to let ppl find about it. Also thanks for the info you have shared with us , I'm looking forward for the 1st of November when the Main Ico sale begins hehe

Author: mrpetem
Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: Hi Ex_Skinrbox,  Really appreciate your positive comments and objective critiques. Most of what you have mentioned is being worked on and the main thing is bringing on board industry influencers. The beta development is under way, but yes we should produce a delivery plan before we enter our next event. It's a good suggestion.  To the wider community, we have not released much more information at this stage, simply because we are still going through IP audit process. We want to be secure on this first before we start revealing too much, which I hope you could understand the reasons for this.  Just to reiterate, our main focus is delivering a solid project that will see the value of the tokens not only become stable but increase in value. So many ICO's are having 'challenging' times because of this lack of real user adoption. It's the one thing that has to be secured to ensure a positive outcome for our supporters and ourselves.  ~ Pete Mardell, CEO TriForce Tokens

Author: mrpetem
Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: Hey CisColtz,  Actually our main ICO event was scheduled for 11th November, but as mentioned in my previous message, we are putting this on hold until we have certain things in place. It's really important we are in the best position to launch this, so hope you and others will understand this move. We will do official announcement quite soon on our medium channel here: https://medium.com/triforcetokens  ~ Pete Mardell, CEO TriForce Tokens

Author: mrpetem
Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: Ok so we haven't reached our targets guys and girls. Although, we still have people contributing, so thank you to everyone still supporting us    So it's highly unlikely we are going to hit that target now. No problem. We didn't get in this for some quick funds from an ICO. In fact any project that doesn't carry on, simply because they didn't raise funding in an ICO, really shouldn't be doing one in the first place - and I think the wider community might agree with this.  We as a team are staying strong to our plan and it's making us more determined then ever. I speak to people on a regular basis in the gaming/dev community who want this. Now we are going to refocus ourselves on delivering the actual technology, growing that gamer community, reaching out to companies and developers. We are putting this re-energised strategy into action from today! Keep following us as we will have some really interesting updates.  Our pre-sale is still not over yet either, so if anyone else wants that 60% bonus (we won't be offering that much again) then join in  ~ Pete Mardell, CEO TriForce Tokens

Author: mrpetem
Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: Thanks everyone.  Ok so our pre-sale event has now ended!  We didn't get the result we would like as I mentioned before. The main trouble is we didn't give ourselves enough time to build a significant following. I mean this ANN thread itself has only been up for two weeks. This was mostly my bad, but there is a lot of positives to take from this. Everyone that is following us and supporting us gives us such great inspiration, and the people we talk to on a daily basis about the project really 'get it'. So our focus now is to:  Continue with the platform and network build Build a strong gamer and developer community Restructure our next ICO events - a few things we didn't get right this time Bring someone high in the gaming industry on board Build on our partners and supporters - with relevant companies Complete our IP Audit process and Cyber Essentials Certification  Once we achieve these points we will have the right level of following and announce further ICO rounds in future.  ~ Pete Mardell, CEO TriForce Tokens

Body: The team here at TriForce Tokens are extremely passionate about our project, what it stands for and the technical solutions we are creating. It is great to see that other institutions such as Coventry University also share our enthusiasm.  The support of institutions such Coventry University Enterprise, has enable TriForce Tokens to access resources and other organisations that help us not only reach our goals and aims, but also elevate our project to another level. Coventry University Enterprise has allowed TriForce Tokens to network with organisations that share similar interests and passions, which will lead to future collaborations. In other words, TriForce Tokens becomes more than just a crypto-currency, but an organisation that looks at the bigger picture. Coventry University Enterprise are also supporting us with our IP Audit to ensure the protection of our intellectual property, that will be conducted by Innovate UK.  ~ Jake Ashby, General Manager TriForce Tokens

Author: slaman29
Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: In case anyone is still wondering why this relatively quiet token is going to be big... 1) It is working to be the first UK compliant ICO. What does this mean? No worry for anyone if the project will suddenly get attacked. 2) It is escrow handled by Coinpayments.net. What does this mean? No worry for anyone if the project will suddenly exit scam. Devs get no money until they deliver. So... they HAVE to deliver. 3) They have backing of UK government Innovate firm, plus Coventry Uni. 4) They are limited company not some shadow company.  All this done before the ICO even launches.  Oh of course. 5) Brilliant idea!

Author: JCBAHY
Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: I just wanted to shed some light on what CoinPayments is, to clarify with our supporters.  We here take our own and our contributors security seriously. We want to be certain that our contributor’s funds are safe and secure, that’s why we have chosen CoinPayments as our escrow provider.  CoinPayments is a global leading payment gateway that provide that extra level of security. Contributor funds are protected in single signature cold wallets that are assigned to each contributor. This ensures that every contributor’s funds are allocated with the correct TriForce Tokens upon distribution and also from getting confused or lost. This also means that TriForce Tokens are unable to access the funds until completion of our milestones. Our milestones have been agreed with CoinPayments, who will only release once certain terms and conditions have been met. 25% of all funds will also be released at each milestone. This ensures that we here at TriForce Tokens provide what we have promised.  ~ Jake Ashby, General Manager TriForce Tokens

Author: mrpetem
Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: Thanks MrData for confirming to our community  ~ Pete Mardell, CEO TriForce Tokens

Author: JCBAHY
Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: Expanding upon my previous post regarding the importance of security and industry regulation, TriForce Tokens is also working towards its Cyber Essentials Plus certification as well as becoming ISO27001 certified.  Security is of upmost importance to us. We want to be able to not only provide ourselves but also our contributor’s with peace of mind. We are taking every measure to ensure that funds are secure, but also our products and services. Data is one of the most valuable commodities of our time, so the protection of data is essential. We are working hard with the UK regulatory body, IT Governance and the FCA to ensure that we are compliant with the UK regulations for both security of our intellectual property and that of our data.  ~ Jake Ashby, General Manager TriForce Tokens

Author: mrpetem
Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: I'm glad you raised this point btcminer49er!  This is a huge reason why we are able to bring our solutions to the market - currently the majority of ways for players to actually generate revenue, are with these "pay2win" style games. It usually ends up costing the players more - they tend not to actually make money doing it. Our solutions completely eradicate this and for once, players will actually be able to generate revenue from their actions, not by how pumped or funded their account is.  Great question..  ~ Pete Mardell, CEO TriForce Tokens

Author: mrpetem
Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: Sorry DirkDiggler1911 I missed this..  So yes, we are already talking with some. The opportunities are going to be greater with smaller and indie game companies, and they make up a large portion of the market. Whether the company decides to make TFT the only form of payment is completely down to them. One of our USP's however is that this will work together with other revenue streams, not a strict replacement, which developers will appreciate as they find the most successful methods of revenue generation is a mix-and-match.  ~ Pete Mardell, CEO TriForce Tokens

Author: mrpetem
Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: Ok I may have misunderstood the type of games you are referring to. Devs will have the choice of implementing whatever type of game mechanics they like, as long as it falls within regulation requirements and they have the correct licences within their jurisdiction. So if they want to implement a pay2win system the can do so. Our solutions though will mean players don't need to pay to win revenue, they can simply be good at the game, or help other people out.  Hope this helps, but if I have misunderstood the type of games you were referring to give me a reference and I will give a clearer answer I hope.  ~ Pete Mardell, CEO TriForce Tokens

Everyone was talking about how you could make money on this game, but you actually had to spend money to keep advancing.  ~ Pete Mardell, CEO TriForce Tokens

It's a world leading group for blockchain businesses. Sorry for any confusion for this.  ~ Pete Mardell, CEO TriForce Tokens

Author: xenon131
Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: Whitepaper sounds good, but please, shed a light on the team involved.  Does it has  enough experience in executing this project? OP has very little info on that to make the conclusion.

Author: mrpetem
Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: Thanks for the question xenon131.  You can find out more on the team on the website, with links to relevant social media channels as a starter.. but I will clarify more here for you.  With regards to myself, I have been the head of development for a young start up for the past 6 years and was key in making that business grow to become one of the most recognised in the industry. I learn't a great deal there, watching it grow from a team of 2 to a team of around 20 and becoming a multi-million pound turn-over business. Through my time there I had been working behind the scenes on my own projects, starting with a bitcoin 'challenge' platform. The concept was to have game developers upload their own browser based games and people would compete against each other with stakes in BTC and I built a few of my own games in Unity3d for it. This project is a much more complicated evolution on this thanks to smart contracts and the evolution of wider technologies. I have always been involved in the crypto space since around 2010/2011, I have done mining, took part in quite a few ICO's and built up a decent portfolio. I also have a real passion for gaming, although due to my development responsibilities I have struggled to find the time in recent years; which I don't consider necessarily a bad thing! I'm probably what you might consider now a more old school gamer Although I still manage to find the time once in a while to play league of legends and some star wars titles. In fact my favourite games have always been start wars - jedi knight 2 jedi outcast. That brings back some really fond memories. So pulling this all together, I am actually combining all my passions; My love of games, crypto and development.  The team as well are all very experienced in their fields, and there is no way we could achieve what we have done without them. Raza Ahmed our CTO gained his masters in software engineering a couple of years ago. He has worked on cryptography, machine learning and blockchain tech and is about to complete his degree with B9Lab to become a certified Ethereum developer. From working with Raza, I know he is a very advanced software engineer although he is very modest about this, and he is regularly approached by big tech companies and even more recently blockchain companies.  We have a few other advanced developers on the team including Jakub Kafarski, Haider Malik and Sorina Rusu each with their own specialist skill set - and again we wouldn't be achieving what we are without them. Jake Ashby is our general manager and although a young guy, he is very smart and has a strong drive about him and completed his BA in international business for which he spent a year abroad in the states.  Our advisers include Kate Breed who has worked for multinationals with regards to business change and consultancy. Owen Ashby who again works high up with multi nationals on corporate strategy and marketing. Then Blake Pope, who is the CEO of Bitcoin PR Buzz and was involved in Lisk (the second largest ICO in history at the time), and involved in some high profile current ICO's.  I hope this gives you a clearer picture of us  We have a solid 4 year plan to execute and have early alphas already released. Over the next few days we will be releasing more details and some exciting news about some new partnerships too.  ~ Pete Mardell, TriForce Tokens CEO

Author: Gordonium
Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: Pete Mardell (the TriForce Tokens CEO) will probably answer this question personally too.  But I would just like to quickly say that I know Pete has been working on TriForce Tokens for years (originally as a Bitcoin powered gaming platform), so perhaps even longer than most other gaming projects. Competition is healthy, it shows how fast the cryptocurrency industry is growing generally, and we wish other blockchain gaming projects all the best, and hope they would do the same for us.  We also have a fully functional very Early Alpha platform (screenshots in the OP) that can be accessed at:  Game Developer Platform Early Alpha: https://developer.triforcetokens.io  Player Platform Early Alpha: https://player.triforcetokens.io    I would also highly recommend reading (or at least skimming) the whitepaper to learn more about TriForce Tokens Steam like blockchain based gaming platform: https://triforcetokens.io/resources/white-paper-v3.3.pdf  Oh and thank you for the best wishes, wishing the same to you

Author: mrpetem
Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: Hey Grahnite, thanks for the well wishes as well  You are right, there are a lot out there. However, no one is dominating the market place right now and competition is healthy. Plus - we are developing very unique solutions that you won't find on these other 'tokens'. We are addressing three key issues in the game development industry and introducing completely new revenue models. If you check out the white paper and also keep an eye out for recent publications I think you will see just how we are unique   ~ Pete Mardell, TriForce Tokens CEO

Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: Thanks guys.. we are a very dedicated team on this project and will carry on working hard to establish ourselves in the industry. We have the right people, bringing on the right partnerships and getting some amazing feedback from the community.  To ekurtovic: With our research partner Dr. Nazaraf Shah, we are working on implementing solutions that will provide developers a means to detect suspicious users and activities through the network. Please check out the white paper, as that should provide a bit more detail for you.  Thanks for the great question  ~ Pete Mardell, TriForce Tokens CEO

Author: mrpetem
Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: Well, it will depend on the platforms that those games exist on or how the architecture has been built - if it is a closed off game, it's going to be pretty tricky to do. We are already in talks with pre-existing game platforms at the moment and we tend to find it depends on the various nuances and their desires. We aren't just building a one size fits all nor will we target everything out there. Our solutions will work best for multi-player games that have an openness to third parties.  Is there some particular older games you are thinking of and we can take a look?  ~ Pete Mardell, TriForce Tokens CEO

Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: No, just to clarify, we are building solutions that will provide developers intelligence and implementations around piracy. Also there is no silver bullet in stopping piracy which is pretty well known in the industry, but the methodologies deployed are to extract what value you can in these situations. We are currently working through IP audits and conducting research within this area, as we have some strategies that can help developers in these situations.  ~ Pete Mardell, TriForce Tokens CEO

Author: mrpetem
Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: Sure there definitely have been a few supermario64!  But consider the size of the industry and the fact no one has dominated the market place with a solution. How many email service providers are there? How many delivery companies exist? They all do the same thing right?  Also, if you dig a bit deeper with our project, we are introducing completely new solutions that no other 'game token' is. The honorary system, anti-piracy, and behavioural analysis to intelligently match players to games, rather than an 'advertising competition' which currently exists in the industry. The indie developers struggle the most and other tokens are just not dealing with this.  Hope it gives some food for thought at least and appreciate your thoughts

Author: mrpetem
Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: Hi cryptokangaroo,  No we are not connected to that and have done our due diligence for this. In fact the organisation who are supporting us in this regard we hope to announce very soon! It's a strong supporter here in the UK and recognised internationally.  ~ Pete Mardell, TriForce Tokens CEO

Author: mrpetem
Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: Hi ekurtovic,  There are many ways actually for both developers and gamers. Perhaps one of the most interesting ways is just by helping other gamers out - they will be able to reward you through honorary tokens. Think of it like building up a publicly verifiable trust profile. For example, you could help someone level up or join a clan and reward members for doing certain achievements. This would be purely in control of the gamers themselves.  The other more common thing though is with item trading. Let's say you crafted an item or found some thing rare. You will be able to list it on an open market place for some TFT. Then there is the p2p challenging - beat your opponent and win their TFT's.  Hope that gives a bit of an idea at least  ~ Pete Mardell, TriForce Tokens CEO

Author: Gordonium
Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: ⚡ ⚡ ⚡ TriForce Tokens ⚡ ⚡ ⚡     TOKEN SALE UPDATE  We are pleased to announce that the TriForce Tokens Presale will run from the 20th of February 2018 to 6th March, 2018.  The TriForce Tokens main sale dates will be announced on this thread and on the official website soon! The discount structure is now fixed to token supply sold as shown below.    https://triforcetokens.io                                     ABOUT TRIFORCE TOKENS   TriForce Tokens is a decentralized platform which will provide users within the online gaming community with decentralized P2P trading, anti-piracy protection, and the world's first honorary rewards system. The network will strive to build community collaboration amongst players, whilst encouraging them to work together and reward one another.  The Early Alpha of TriForce Tokens blockchain based gaming platform is available now for anyone to join and test out, please keep in mind we are still pushing constant updates and development on the platform. Please see screenshots and access links lower in this post.  TriForce Tokens platform uses an ERC 20-based (TFT) digital token, designed to become the industry standard on multiple gaming platforms and hold an increasing value on the open market. One of the tokens main unique features is that it will provide a completely new revenue model for the game developer market. The tokenized platform will also lower player attrition rate, offer behavioral analysis, and give players a new gaming experience where they can build their own digital asset empire.   TRIFORCE RESOURCES     TriForce Intro Video  Whitepaper  Official Website  Medium  Twitter  Telegram Group  Facebook  Documents  GitHub   TOKEN SPECIFICATIONS   The technology being deployed to serve the TriForce Tokens ecosystem is a combination of the ERC20 compatible tokens implemented on a solidity framework on top of the Ethereum Network. The full technology stack will also include node.js servers, enterprise-level data stores, Hadoop for big data interrogation, front-end technologies such as ReactJS and native mobile applications.  There are many components that have to be considered and so the development strategy will consist of many stages, with the primary focus to deploy a beta version by Q2 2018. This will include a player and developer platform, smart contracts connected to the blockchain and developer integration kits to serve the core functionality.      TRIFORCE TOKENS TOKEN SALE ROUNDS   The TriForce Tokens main token sale will be announced soon on this thread and on the website. The main token sale bonus structure will be broken up into three stages.                 TOKEN PRESALE BONUS STAGES  First Day Discount 25% - Get+1,500 Extra!   TOKEN DISTRIBUTION  Total token supply is 2Bn and from that 1.5Bn will be available for contributors, any remaining tokens will be burnt.  ROADMAP   Official Public ICO Launch - The main funding round opens to contributors. Please see the section on ICO rules for more details.  December 2017: Establish Base of Operations and Recruitment Drive. Establish new offices in an area with a high level of technical talent and high concentration of gaming companies.  April 2018: Achieve ISO27001 certification. Phase 1 of the beta network is completed, which includes item trading, quests, and honorary system. Beta version of anti-piracy strategies are deployed.  May 2018: Become fully GDPR compliant with help from IT Governance Ltd.  June 2018: Complete beta version integration kit libraries for platforms and build developer community platform with full documentation.  November 2018: Complete phase 2 of beta network, which includes decentralized tournaments, peer-to-peer betting, player behavioral engine.  March 2019: Release full production version of entire TriForce Tokens technology.          TEAM   TriForce Tokens is backed by a highly experienced team from various sectors including corporate management, startups, the gaming industry, cryptocurrency development, blockchain technology, and computer science. The development team is led by Pete Mardell, CEO and the Former head of development for a leading UK recruitment platform. He is also a passionate gamer and long-time cryptocurrency enthusiast.  Raza Ahmed is the company CTO, in addition to being a Senior Full Stack and Qualified Blockchain developer, MSc Software Development. Nazaraf Shah is the company’s Ph.D. Research Engineer, in addition to being a Senior Lecturer in Ethical Hacking and Computer Security at Coventry University.         Bitcoin PR Buzz  Joining TriForce Tokens as an advisor and Public Relations Coordinator, Blake, Bitcoin PR Buzz CEO. He personally founded Bitcoin PR Buzz over 4 years ago. He has years of experience having worked closely with many successful ICO's including NEM, UTRUST and Lisk, which became the second biggest crypto-currency crowdfunding event in history at the time.  To ensure TriForce receives the growth and recognition it deserves, Bitcoin PR Buzz will be coordinating TriForce's PR for at least the next six months after the ICO period.  TIGA  TriForce recently became a full member of gaming industry representative TIGA. TIGA is the network for games developers and digital publishers and the trade association representing the video games industry. Their core purpose is to strengthen the games development and digital publishing sector. They achieve this by campaigning for the industry in the corridors of power, championing the industry in the media and helping their members commercially.  IT Governance  We have partnered with IT Governance LTD to obtain full ISO27001 accreditation. IT governance is a framework that ensures your organisation's IT infrastructure supports and enables the achievement of its corporate strategies and objectives. The official IT governance standard is ISO/IEC 38500:2015. It sets out a straightforward framework for the board's governance of information and communications technology and is a key resource for IT governance professionals everywhere in the world.  Crypto Valley  The Crypto Valley Association is an independent, government-supported association established to take full advantage of Switzerland’s strengths to build the world’s leading blockchain and cryptographic technologies ecosystem. They support and connect startups and established enterprises through policy recommendations, projects across verticals, initiating and enabling research, and organizing conferences, hackathons, and other industry events. With active connections to similar hubs around the world. They also ensure Crypto Valley’s participation in the global efforts to foster blockchain and cryptographic technology innovation.  TriForce is proud to be a corporate member of the Swiss-based blockchain startup incubator.   Coventry University Enterprises  CUE Ltd is a business arm of Coventry University and is providing resources and help with establishing the young start-ups business foundation - providing the project with access to research graduates, IP protection/auditing through Innovate UK and business mentoring. Being connected to CUE Ltd provided the business with access to EU grants for business and research.Being connected to CUE Ltd provides the business with access to EU grants and wider networking opportunities to the gaming sector in Coventry  Coinpayments - Escrow of TriForce Token Sale Funds  We recently sealed a partnership with escrow fund management provider Coinpayments.net. CoinPayments is a cloud wallet solution that offers an easy way to integrate a checkout system for numerous cryptocurrencies. Its website offers payment solutions for multiple crypto-currencies such as bitcoin and litecoin. The company also provides various shopping cart plugins, as well as custom payment solutions and an array of merchant tools.  Coinpayments will be escrowing a large portion of the TriForce token sale funds after the ICO period.    TRIFORCE TOKENS EARLY ALPHA PLATFORM: UNDER DEVELOPMENT   The TriForce Tokens Early Alpha platform (under constant development) can be accessed at:  Game Developer Platform Early Alpha: https://developer.triforcetokens.io  Player Platform Early Alpha: https://player.triforcetokens.io     Developer Dashboard Early Alpha      Player Dashboard Early Alpha      Player Wallet Platform Author: mrpetem
Title: ⚡ [ANN] ⚡ TriForce Tokens Gaming ⚡ [ICO Escrowed] 🚀 Industry Partnerships 🚀
Body: Hey nnekic86,  Actually the 75% would be 375m of the total 500m supply. The other 25% is attributed toward the actual ecosystem itself, advisory team, core team, bounties/marketing and founders. Further explanation of the break down on percentages will be in our white paper as well.  And of course, feel free to ask questions anytime   ~ Pete Mardell, TriForce Tokens CEO
